headline: Why Paramount (PSKY) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of multinational media and entertainment corporation Paramount (NASDAQ:PARA) fell 5.4% in the morning session after reports surfaced that the company submitted a cash bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, an offer that was met with caution amid negative analyst sentiment.
